name: Norton AntiVirus User Profile File
summary: Learn about .USERPROFILE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The file MyProfile.UserProfile is a hidden file and can be found in the Application Data\​Symantec\​Shared user directory. It is also accompanied by a Norton AntiVirus .VCPREF file named Options.VcPref.
NOTE: Norton AntiVirus became Norton Security in 2014.

description: File used by Norton AntiVirus, a program used to protect computers from viruses; contains subscription information that may reside on a computer even after Norton AntiVirus has been deleted.
